about.title: What is TradeIQ?
about.description: TradeIQ is an AI-powered technical analysis platform that detects patterns, analyzes trends, and highlights high-volatility zones in real-time. Our advanced machine learning algorithms provide traders with the insights they need to make informed decisions faster than ever before.
